entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
